desserts.name: Dalgona (Korean sugar candy)
desserts.description: Sweet Sugar Candy with fun shape

desserts.name: Korean Fish Shaped Bread (Bungeoppang)
desserts.description: Bungeoppang is a fish-shaped bread with sweetened red bean filling.

desserts.name: Korean Sweet Pancake (Hotteok)
desserts.description: Bungeoppang is a fish-shaped bread with sweetened red bean filling.

desserts.name: Korean rice cake dessert
desserts.description: Garae-tteok is a rice cake made with Korean rice, which is long and thin in a round shape. Gara-tteok can be found in Korean rice cake shops. However, if there is only a Korean market, you can use small rice cakes called tteok-bokki (hot and spicy rice cake) rice cakes.
